name: Sweet Dreams (densegoo)
description:
The best way to get energy for the next day is getting good sleep! In Sweet Dreams, try to have good dreams by performing well in dream minigames.

For GoGodot Game Jam 2

CONTROLS:

The entire game controls with just directions (arrow keys or WASD) and the action button ( or "A" button on a controller).

HOW TO PLAY:

Each night, you will play a number of randomized minigames. Performing well increases your energy for the next day, as well as increasing the difficulty of all minigames. Start a game with 100% progress AND get GREAT sleep to win!

CREDITS:

Fonts are from fonts.google.com.

  • RobotoCondensed: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto+Condensed
  • Source Code Pro: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Source+Code+Pro

All code, art, sounds, and music created by DenseGoo
